summary: Mary Turner goes up for three years on a crime she didn't commit. Once out she and former prison mates plan a scam in which old men can be sued for breach of promise - the "heart balm" ... See full summary Â»

Johnson|Fred Kelsey|Wilbur Mack|Tom Mahoney|Polly Moran|Lee Phelps|Herbert Prior|Jed Prouty|Walter Walker|Clarence Wilson
title: Pagada
